name: H2O (itch)
description:
To reset level hold down SPACE

This game was made for a one button game jam with 3 themes grow, fly, and bounce.

In this game you are water with one objective and that is to water the sun flower.

Press the space to change the state of matter.

When you are ice you can bounce and slide but if you hit the sun flower you kill it.

You need to be in the liquid state to successfully water the plant. When you are a liquid and you hit something you splash into small droplets that will be absorbed into the soil.

When you are in the gas state you float and can be pushed by the wind.
